item.title: Bangalore to Thekkady Solo Trip Plan
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Thekkady is one of the best ways to unwind, explore nature and enjoy a peaceful break. Thekkady, located in Kerala’s Idukki district, is famous for the Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary, spice plantations, lush green hills and calm backwaters. Whether you love wildlife, photography, food, or long road trips, this journey offers something for everyone. This guide gives
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
